body:
ALTER TABLE dbo.RN100_Kullanicilar
ADD OctoCoreGuid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER 
    CONSTRAINT DF_RN100_Kullanicilar_OctoCoreGuid DEFAULT NEWSEQUENTIALID();
Go

Update  dbo.RN100_Kullanicilar Set  OctoCoreGuid = Default
Go

Create Unique NonClustered Index UIX_RN100_Kullanicilar_OctoCoreGuid
On dbo.[RN100_Kullanicilar] (OctoCoreGuid)
On [PRIMARY]
Go
